author: kaz
msg: - added checkstyle target that only runs if ${sourcesPresent}
- removed the hardcoded 'src' directory specified in the JXR task and
replaced with ${src}.
- Pass the ${testSourcesPresent} into the stylesheet now that its
been distinguished from ${sourcesPresent}.  This was not the case
previously.

author: kaz
msg: Added two blank lines to the top of the file.  Why?  Checkstyle uses
this file and makes sure all source files have included it.  However,
checkstyle expects this to be the first thing in the source file, but we
typically have the package declaration.  Thus, we pad the LICENSE file
with two addition blanks lines (one for the package desclaration and one
for the blank line that follows).  Then we tell checkstyle to not
compare line 1.  See the documentation for more information.

author: kaz
msg: - Adding the checkstyle report link to the navbar.
- Also removing some unneeded HTML.

author: kaz
msg: The Checkstyle DVSL stylesheet that is used to produce the report.  This
was ripped from the XSLT checkstyle report in their contrib dir.  Of
course, we have some nice additions such as the linking to the cross
referenced sources.
